external-cdb
************


Description
===========

An Oracle Cloud Infrastructure resource that allows you to manage an
external container database.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* disable-db-management

* disable-external-container-database-stack-monitoring

* enable-db-management

* enable-external-container-database-stack-monitoring

* get

* list

* list-external-pdbs

* scan-pluggable-databases

* update
